snippet.title: 1 Minute RPG GamePlay - iOS Game
snippet.description:
1 Minute RPG
http://itunes.apple.com/app/id449810654

This is simple and fast RPG.

There is no difficult skill tree or huge maps, and complicated system. You just press left or right button, then you can level up and clear the stage.

NextFloor
Website : http://nextfloor.co.kr 
Twitter : http://twitter.com/NextFloorGames 
Facebook : http://facebook.com/NextFloor 
YouTube : http://www.youtube.com/NextFloorGames
